summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use, amending Sections 23.71.014, 23.71.038, 23.71.044, 23.76.004 (Exhibit A) and 23.76.006 and repealing Sections 23.71.020, 23.71.024, 23.71.026, 23.71.028 and 23.71.029 to repeal requirements for a General Development Plan within the Northgate Overlay District.
